values.subtitle: Build Relationships
values.text: Networking and building resources in order to increase ownership in the field

values.subtitle: Empower Marginalized Technologists
values.text: Creating a space and opportunities for each other.  Reducing industry bias, promoting visibility, and increasing leadership through peer-led development

values.subtitle: Share Knowledge
values.text: Fostering education and professional growth. Providing an environment that values support and learning at all levels
